pages.title: Usefull blocks
pages.text: Here is a list of blocks that add new mechanics or usefull features.

Nearby animals will flock to the trough to eat the food within. This works just as if a player had fed the animal, but with a few differences: $(li)There's a chance the animal will need more than one bit of food to get in love mode.
$(li) Animals bred with the trough will not produce XP $(li) If there's more than 32 animals in a 10 block radius, the animals will eat, but never enter love mode.
